idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# New TunePad cell
#lets use some loops
#play high hat number 4 for 4 x 1/4 beats
for i in range(4):
    playNote(4,beats =0.25)
    
#play high hat number 5 for 4 x 1/4 beats
for i in range(4):
    playNote(5,beats =0.50)
    
#play high hat number 4 for 4 x 1/4 beats
for i in range(2):
    playNote(2,beats =0.25)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Set up the melody
def piano_melody():
    playNote(60, beats=1, velocity=80)
    rest(beats=0.5)
    playNote(58, beats=0.5, velocity=90)
    playNote(55, beats=0.5, velocity=90)
    playNote(60, beats=1, velocity=100)
    
    rest(beats=0.5)
    
    playNote(59, beats=1, velocity=85)
    playNote(56, beats=0.5, velocity=90)
    playNote(61, beats=0.5, velocity=75)
    playNote(59, beats=1, velocity=80)
    
    
# Play the melody a few times for a loop effect
for _ in range(2):
    piano_melody()

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# carving out frequencies for a clap sound in the drums
clap = 5
with bandpass(frequency = [100, 11000], beats=4):
    for i in range(0, 16):
        playNote(clap, beats = 0.25)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
#start up melody 
playNote(21,2)
playNote(22,2)
playNote(21,2)
playNote(24,2)
playNote(21,2)
playNote(22,2)
playNote(21,2)
playNote(24,1)
# apply a constant pitch bend
with bend(cents = 100):
    playNote(20)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# partly swing a 8th note snare pattern
snare = 50
with swing(0.5):
    for i in range(0, 24):
        playNote(snare, beats = 0.5)
